title: How to Meet or Contact Jenna Ortega in Person, Online, or by Mail

steps.title: Best chance: Convention appearances like Comic Con
steps.content: Best chance: Convention appearances like Comic Con Check local convention schedules to see if Jenna’s coming to a city near you, or follow her on social media or check fan-run websites like Jenna-Ortega.com for updates.

steps.title: Less frequent chance: Charity events that Jenna supports
steps.content: Less frequent chance: Charity events that Jenna supports Some charities and organizations that Jenna is known to support (and may attend events for) include City Year , the GOOD+ Foundation , and the Elizabeth Glaser Pediatric AIDS Foundation . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Random chance: Red carpet events
steps.content: Random chance: Red carpet events Jenna will undoubtedly be present for events related to her work. Just Google when and where the event will be (and where to get in line). These events fill up with spectators quickly, so plan to arrive early enough to be within the first 100 people in line.

steps.title: Leave a comment or DM Jenna directly on her social media accounts.
steps.content: Leave a comment or DM Jenna directly on her social media accounts. Reach out to Jenna on: Facebook Instagram TikTok Jenna Ortega doesn’t currently have an account on X (formerly known as Twitter), although there are several fan-run accounts with large followings like @TheJennaOrtega .

steps.title: Jenna doesn't publicly share her phone number or email address.
steps.content: Jenna doesn't publicly share her phone number or email address. If phone or email is your preferred method of communication, reach out to someone on her management team directly or contact her agency, Creative Artists Agency (CAA) : CAA email: info@caa.com CAA phone: 1 (424) 288-2000

steps.title: Send general fan mail to Gilbertson Management.
steps.content: Send general fan mail to Gilbertson Management. If you want to write Jenna Ortega a personal letter, request an autographed photo, or simply send her some gushing fan mail , reach out to Gilbertson Management in Los Angeles: [2] X Research source Jenna Ortega Gilbertson Management 10501 Wilshire Blvd Unit 2203 Los Angeles, CA 90024-6332 USA Phone: 1 (310) 393-8585

steps.title: Or, send fan mail about Jenna’s book to Penguin Random House.
steps.content: Or, send fan mail about Jenna’s book to Penguin Random House . If you’re a fan of Jenna Ortega’s book, It’s All Love: Reflections for Your Heart & Soul , send a letter or autograph request to Penguin Random House: [3] X Research source Jenna Ortega Penguin Random House 1745 Broadway New York, NY 10019 USA Phone: 1 (212) 751-2600

steps.title: Be sincere and include a return envelope to get a response.
steps.content: Be sincere and include a return envelope to get a response. Introduce yourself and state how or why Jenna’s work has meaningfully impacted you, then highlight things you have in common or mention a cause or issue Jenna stands for that resonates with you. Conclude with a polite request to return your letter, send an autograph, or answer a burning question you have. [4] X Research source Include a return envelope with your address and a stamp inside your letter. This makes it easier (and more likely) for Jenna to respond to you! Keep in mind that there’s a good chance someone from Jenna’s management team will see your letter first. The more personal the letter, the more likely they’ll be to pass it on.
